DATE_ADD(mf.auth_end_date, INTERVAL 1 DAY) < NOW()
DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(mf.auth_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL #{num} DAY) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND `status` = 0

SELECT pu.user_id, (SELECT name FROM trains.sys_user WHERE id = pu.user_id) AS name FROM pc_role pr INNER JOIN pc_user_role pu ON pr.id = pu.pc_role_id WHERE pr.franchisee_id = #{franchisee_id} AND pr.ename = 'sjgly' AND pr.del_flag =0
mapper.update: UPDATE trains.train_model_franchisee SET status = 1 WHERE id = ${id} AND DATE_ADD(auth_end_date, interval 1 DAY) < NOW() AND `status` = 0
UPDATE trains.supply_protocol_shop SET status = ${status} WHERE franchisee_id = ${franchisee_id}

UPDATE (SELECT * FROM trains.pc_role WHERE franchisee_id = ${franchisee_id}) r INNER JOIN trains.pc_menu_role mr ON r.id = mr.role_id INNER JOIN trains.pc_menu m ON mr.menu_id = m.id SET mr.`status` = ${status} WHERE m.is_pay = 1
